document_data.caption: Map showing the Darkflow River in the Vast Swamp.
document_data.name: Darkflow River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Darkflow River''', or simply the '''Darkflow''', was a short river in the [[Vast Swamp]] that formed part of the border between [[Cormyr]] and [[Sembia]] in the east.
document_data.Geography:
The source of the Darkflow lay in the heart of the Vast Swamp, being fed by the marsh-water itself, and it flowed south into the [[Lake of Dragons]].

The regular rains over the Vast Swamp caused the Darkflow to swell and flood the lands beside it.
document_data.Description: The river was wide and flowed only sluggishly. This was a result of sediment, filth, and pollution in the Vast Swamp—the water was not filtered or cleaned as would happen in a natural marsh. As a result, the river-water was foul and stinking.
document_data.Fauna: The river was home to countless dangerous creatures.
document_data.Activities: [[Lizardmen]] dwelling in the Vast Swamp sometimes ventured down the Darkflow to raid villages.
document_data.History: The village of [[Battlerise]], which stood on the west bank of the Darkflow River, was once beset by lizardmen from the river and monsters emerging from the Vast Swamp. Long before the 1360s [[DR]], its population had plummeted.
